body: Park Concessioner       Elk Creek Marina, LLC will operate the Elk Creek and Lake Fork Marinas at Curecanti National Recreation Area, providing boat and slip rentals, guiding service, food and beverage, retail, and other services. Elk Creek Marina, LLC Website »  Phone: (970) 641-0707 Email: elkcreek@thebluemesa.com
title: Curecanti National Recreation Area: Park Concessioner
